thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Patricia Williams
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Patricia Williams

author: Patricia Williams
title: Patricia Williams
text: Counter in Picton is easy to find and only a very short distance from ferry.. Staff there were friendly and helpful. When they made a small goof with the contract, they immediately owned up to and corrected it. Car was a Toyota Corolla (just what we wanted) only about two years old, in excellent condition. When we got a flat tire (not due to faulty tire), someone over the phone quickly answered my question. Drop off at Hertz counter in Dunedin was easy. Cost was way lower than the big multi-national companies. We could not have been happier.
